actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enlarge the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate for addition to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site not more than 50 acres in East Saint Louis, Illinois, contiguous with the Mississippi River. Authorizes the appropriation of sums necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enlarge the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site.
